text: RE: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings. I agree...yet this wasn't so much moving things around as turning something back on that was previously off. I don't even know why they bothered since it's just an "improved experience." I would have understood more if they turned it back on to peddle something else like Copilot, but that doesn't appear to be the case.

metadata.topic: RE: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings.
